steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Leather';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id FROM wip_material WHERE origin_material_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material IDs that use the material "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id IN ('8');
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting task IDs that produce the WIP materials using "Leather"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.id IN ('5', '11', '16', '24', '27', '31', '32');
steps.description: Retrieve the details of the cutting tasks that use "Leather"

response:
